roleset.name: to deal with inefficiently
roleset.note: MISHANDLE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'mishandle' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from mishandle.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: A story about how he mishandled the sale to his son of his stock in a media company controlled [*] by his political patron Percy Sutton [*T*-2]was allowed [*-3] to fester a full week before Mr. Dinkins faced the media .
example.arg: the sale to his son of his stock in a media company controlled [*] by his political patron Percy Sutton
